author: Simon Difford
description: A mix of fruit juice and champagne with a sweet pomegranate syrup surprise in the bottom of the glass.
name: Blushing Mimosa
recipeIngredient: 90 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: POUR half the champagne into chilled glass, then orange juice, pineapple juice and the rest of the champagne
Finally pour pomegranate syrup/grenadine in to glass and allow to sink through cocktail
